Transcription for 460893

I knocked somebody over by the way as a consequence of Arbovan.
I was walking downhill from the art college in Crouch End, Hornsey, and somebody, I heard
a guy who I knew quite well, a fellow student say, what's black slides and eats children?
And somebody said, oh I heard that one, that's Arbovan.
And I just turned around and slugged him.
Which was pretty pathetic really, wasn't it?
And he never forgave me really, and he was actually quite a good number eight, which
was a tragedy for a rugby team really.
